sentences.sentence: To understand how that works, you can think of an MC as a spreadsheet, whose cells are the metrics.
sentences.translation: 为了理解它是如何运作的的，您可以将 MC 看作一个电子表格，它的单元格是度量标准。

sentences.sentence: STR projects the industry will end 2011 with increases in all three key metrics.
sentences.translation: STR 预测，2011年产业的三个关键业绩评估指标都会上升。

sentences.sentence: Director of Institute for Health Metrics and Evaluation Chris Murray described it as an "urgent call to action".
sentences.translation: 健康指标与评估研究所所长克里斯·默里将其描述为“应刻不容缓地采取行动”。
